response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, but its true value to you is yet to be discovered. I understand that its worth might be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $650,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a generous discount compared to its intrinsic value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with someone who appreciates it as much as I do.", "product_price": 650000}
